entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 24 km
